mean_cn: v. 仔细检查或详尽地讨论，审查，游说；  n. 讨论，细查，劝诱
mean_en: to talk to the people in an area in order to get them to support a candidate, project, idea, etc.
short_phrase: canvass people to see what they think
sentence: His job was to canvass voters and record how they thought they would vote.
sentence_trans: 他的工作是游说选民并纪录他们考虑投谁。
